name: Camazotz
description: Large chaotic evil fiend with a menacing presence, characterized by its fiery attacks and ability to transform into a bat.
memorable: Camazotz can summon swarms of bats and creates vampires from fallen foes.
goals: To dominate opponents and spread chaos and fear.
relations: May command giant bats or vrock allies in battle.
environment: Often found in dark and sinister locations.
strengths: Remarkably high hit points, strong saving throws, and multiple formidable attacks including fire damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, making it susceptible to specific tactics.
attacks: Can perform multiple melee attacks including a devastating bite and claws, as well as unleash a powerful fire breath attack.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath that deals substantial fire and necrotic damage in a wide area.
senses: Blindsight up to 120 feet and truesight up to 30 feet provide unparalleled awareness.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, and has a high passive perception of 23.
additional_information: Unique ability to create vampires from slain foes.
Can call bats to swarm and distract enemies.
Possesses strong magic resistance against spells.
Ability to change shape into a giant bat.
Can extinguish light sources and cause damage with fiery wing beat.
spellcasting: Can cast powerful spells without material components, including dominate person and incendiary cloud.
test_queries: large chaotic evil fiend with fire attacks
fiend that summons bats and vampires
monster that transforms into a giant bat
creature with blindsight and strong magic resistance
